snippet: T-Mobile nearly tripled its profit in the fourth quarter as its lower-priced plans helped it add more than two million subscribers.
lead_paragraph: T-Mobile nearly tripled its profit in the fourth quarter as its lower-priced plans helped it add more than two million subscribers.

headline.main: T-Mobile Reports Profit Surge After Cutting Price of Plans
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; T-Mobile Reports Profit Surge After Cutting Price of Plans
